about_the_game:
Magical Girl D is a hentai RPG that focuses on futanari and yuri, plus a dozen other fetishes.
It's a steamy, hardcore, uncensored gaming experience!

When Harumi encounters the fearsome Sinners, she somehow transforms into a magical girl!
But with this transformation comes more than she ever bargained for.
Something thick and hard has appeared between her legs, and now her life will never be the same again...

The Story So Far...

The stars have fallen. From the split husks of fallen stars emerge the Sinners. These beasts seek to scour the planet and subjugate its populace. All hope has been extinguished in the depths of the darkest night. Selected girls are blessed with power and encouraged to bite back. Night descends as the brave girls stand against the darkness...

Features

  • Hot CG scenes with clothed and nude variations
  • Multiple playable characters
  • Build a party of your favorite magical girls
  • Deep and strategic turn-based combat

content_descriptors.notes: This game features sexual encounters between consenting adults. All characters depicted are 18 years or older. Sexual themes include futanari and yuri.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Magical girls & futanari - the sexy combo you never knew you wanted! Hentai action and RPG combat blend together to deliver a tantalizing erotic experience.
